about_the_game:
Quieter and more powerful than a conventional revolver, the Nagant M1895 is an absolute beast. A personal favourite of Jun from her Night Ops days, this revolver is the rare combination of silent, deadly and lightweight!
This Weapon Bundle contains;
- The Nagant M1895 Pistol
- 2 Charms (Jun’s Family Locket, Hero of China Medal)
- 2 Bespoke Weapon Skins (Hammer and Sickle, Chinese Dragon)
detailed_description:
Quieter and more powerful than a conventional revolver, the Nagant M1895 is an absolute beast. A personal favourite of Jun from her Night Ops days, this revolver is the rare combination of silent, deadly and lightweight!
This Weapon Bundle contains;

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 7 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 7 64-bit version 7601 supported only via the Vulkan launcher option.
